Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 51st overall pick, by Detroit in 2007...
Injured on 8/14/2007 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Traded from Detroit to Seattle on 1/31/2010 (Going to DET: RF C. Figgins. Going to SEA: P B. Colvin, RF M. Taylor)...
Injured on 8/20/2010 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/18/2012 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2013, off Ian West (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2013, off Bud Smith (MIN)...
Injured on 8/22/2013 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2016...
Traded from Seattle to New York (A) on 7/31/2018 (Going to SEA: P A. Sonnanstine. Going to NYA: RF M. Taylor)...
Traded from New York (A) to Oakland on 2/8/2019 (Going to NYA: P E. Heusser Jr., SS C. Gehringer Jr., 2B J. Kipnis, SS H. Ramirez. Going to OAK: RF M. Taylor, P G. Casiano)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/8/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
